thread.section_title: Latest business and finance news from New Zealand and the world's key markets - Yahoo New Zealand Finance
thread.title: McDonald's tops 2Q forecasts

title: McDonald's tops 2Q forecasts
text:
Fri, Jul 24, 2015, 1:25 AM NZST - New Zealand Markets open in 8 hrs 35 mins McDonald's tops 2Q forecasts 
McDonald's has posted a second-quarter profit of $US1.2 billion ($A1.63 billion). 
The Oak Brook, Illinois-based company reported on Thursday a net income of $1.26 a share. 
The results surpassed Wall Street expectations. 
The world's biggest hamburger chain posted revenue of $US6.5 billion in the period, which also topped Wall Street forecasts. 
McDonald's shares have risen 4 per cent since the beginning of the year, while the Standard & Poor's 500 index has risen almost 3 per cent. 
The stock has dropped almost 4 per cent in the past 12 months. @YahooNZBusiness on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook % Chg Your most recently viewed tickers will automatically show up here if you type a ticker in the "Enter symbol/company" at the bottom of this module.
